title: Bug 120315: Display property not taking effect in new PDF emitter when set to 'none'
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, it does not take effect.
EB: The display property should take effect in the new PDF emitter, regardless of whether it is set to 'none' or any other valid value.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Set the display property of an item to 'none' in the new PDF emitter.
2. Verify that the item is still visible in the generated PDF file.
